constituent: sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, tongue wagging
heisigComment: * The primitive from this kanji also means simply a sound.
heisigStory: The kanji for sound depicts something standing in the air over a tongue wagging in a mouth, much the same as a sound does for the briefest of moments before disappearing.
hint: the 50s uuuu rock song from fg
koohiiStory1: If you were standing on the sun, believe me, you´d be making sound.
koohiiStory2: The tongue wagging in a mouth produces a very high-pitched sound, breaking a nearby vase.
myStory: âm thanh. đứng cả ngày sẽ gây âm thanh mệt mỏi
readingExamples: 音楽 (おんがく), 発音 (はつおん), 騒音 (そうおん), 音 (おと), 音 (ね)
words: tone color, tone quality, timbre, synthesizer patch
